title: Veggie rose tart
ingredients: ['1 sheet puff pastry, defrosted', '1 egg', '200g ricotta cheese', '60g fresh mozzarella, cubed', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 sprig fresh thyme', 'salt, to taste', '6 different coloured carrots', '2 courgettes', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
